channel.title: Changing Drops?
channel.description:
Is it possible to make the drop percentage lower than 1%? if so, how do I do this?
Thanks

item.title: Changing Drops?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Pure Demons, post:6, topic:329902”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=426287.msg3131221#msg3131221 date=1266524755]

Is it possible to make the drop percentage lower than 1%? if so, how do I do this?

Thanks
[/quote]You should only have to go into npcdrops.cfg and find the npc you want to have a lot drop rate for. Then add the npc’s id (or find it if it’s already added) and add the item ids. If you want a higher drop rate, add more of that item, but if you want a lower one, add less.

…That post is stupid. No offense, but you just answered how to add drops, not how to make the percentage lower than 1%.[/quote]Well I’m sorry for being in a rush and not being able to answer fully <.<. When you are adding drops, you can add them more than once. If I wanted to make the drop rate for an item 1%, I’d add that item once, then 99 of something such as mantas to create that percentage. For example:

391 1 391 1 391 1 391 1 8008 1

I really can’t use tab on an iPod, but this is basically what it would look like to give an item a 20% chance of being dropped. If you were to add “391 1” 99 times and then whatever item you wanted only once, that creates the 1% you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Drops?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:2, topic:329902”][quote author=Zezerex link=topic=426287.msg3131199#msg3131199 date=1266523080]
Is it possible to make the drop percentage lower than 1%? if so, how do I do this?

Thanks
[/quote]You should only have to go into npcdrops.cfg and find the npc you want to have a lot drop rate for. Then add the npc’s id (or find it if it’s already added) and add the item ids. If you want a higher drop rate, add more of that item, but if you want a lower one, add less. [/quote]

…That post is stupid. No offense, but you just answered how to add drops, not how to make the percentage lower than 1%.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Drops?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:3, topic:329902”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=426287.msg3131221#msg3131221 date=1266524755]
You should only have to go into npcdrops.cfg and find the npc you want to have a lot drop rate for. Then add the npc’s id (or find it if it’s already added) and add the item ids. If you want a higher drop rate, add more of that item, but if you want a lower one, add less.
[/quote]

I disagree with you 100%. It is possible to lower it more then 1%, but you must add more drops worth higher then 1%, which kind of diminishes it. Say you want an AGS to be rarer then a 1% drop. You add a few more items that the monster drops, for a 2% drop, or higher if you want it even more rare. Very simple, because, most likely, you will end up getting a drop that is a 2% drop, then 1%.
What? That’s nonsense and you know it. Everyone uses the dropsystem with percentages nowadays.

Anyway, good question. I don’t think it’s possible, because the dropsystem uses misc.random().
And misc.random() does not work with ,'s or .'s. So it isn’t possible to make a drop rate below 1%.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Drops?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:3, topic:329902”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=426287.msg3131221#msg3131221 date=1266524755]
You should only have to go into npcdrops.cfg and find the npc you want to have a lot drop rate for. Then add the npc’s id (or find it if it’s already added) and add the item ids. If you want a higher drop rate, add more of that item, but if you want a lower one, add less.
[/quote]
What? That’s nonsense and you know it. Everyone uses the dropsystem with percentages nowadays.

Anyway, good question. I don’t think it’s possible, because the dropsystem uses misc.random().
And misc.random() does not work with ,'s or .'s. So it isn’t possible to make a drop rate below 1%.[/quote] OK, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Drops?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

rip4d:

You should only have to go into npcdrops.cfg and find the npc you want to have a lot drop rate for. Then add the npc’s id (or find it if it’s already added) and add the item ids. If you want a higher drop rate, add more of that item, but if you want a lower one, add less.

What? That’s nonsense and you know it. Everyone uses the dropsystem with percentages nowadays.

Anyway, good question. I don’t think it’s possible, because the dropsystem uses misc.random().
And misc.random() does not work with ,'s or .'s. So it isn’t possible to make a drop rate below 1%.

Read full topic
